title: Fantasy football rankings for Week 5: Falcons' Matt Ryan takes aim at Texans
text:
CLOSE SportsPulse: Week 4 offered up some stunning results. Trysta Krick recaps all the upsets and the lasting ramifications they will have on the season. USA TODAY

Fantasy football rankings for Week 5 are based on the point-per-reception (PPR) scoring used in most seasonal and daily fantasy football formats. One point is awarded for every 10 rushing and receiving yards and one point for every 20 passing yards. Six points are awarded for touchdowns scored, four points for passing TDs and one point for receptions.

Rankings are compiled by FantasySharks.com.

(*- Be sure to check injury/status before kickoff)

description: The potent Atlanta Falcons duo of QB Matt Ryan and WR Julio Jones occupy top spots in this week's position rankings as they host the Texans.
